name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting)

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed

createValues.description: Whether or not to copy the values file from the chart to use for deployment.

environments.description: A comma seperated list of environments to add values for.

runBuildTarget.description: An optional build target to call before running the helm chart.

runResourceName.description: The name of the resource to port-forward to within minikube).

runHostPort.description: The host port to use when port-forwarding to minikube.

runContainerPort.description: The container port to use when port-forwarding to minikube.

isStandaloneConfig.description: should the project use package.json? If false, the project config is inside workspace.json.
